title: Tom Hardy grunting in Taboo 72 times in this video is ridiculously sexy | Metro News
text:
Olivia Waring for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 7:36 am Together, Tom Hardy’s guttural grunts, groans and murmurs make a symphony of sex appeal (Picture: BBC) 
Following his weirdly sexy turns on children’s TV, it’s time we took Tom Hardy back to where he belongs — in our dark fantasies. Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
How do we do that, exactly? 
Well someone has helped us out massively by stitching together every single virile grunt he emitted in his BBC period drama Taboo . 
And there are a helluva lot, displaying a range of emotions, from satisfaction to rage and everything in between. 
We recommend you click the ‘2’ double time option under settings on the YouTube video to get a rather, er, different effect. 
Way better than Fifty Shades Darker, we think you’ll agree.
